sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { useInView } from 'react-intersection-observer'; import { Briefcase, Users, Award, MapPin, Clock, DollarSign, ArrowRight, Send, X } from 'lucide-react'; const Career = () => { const [selectedJob, setSelectedJob] = useState(null); const [careerRef, careerInView] = useInView({ threshold: 0.3, triggerOnce: true }); const jobs = [ { id: 1, title: 'Senior Mechanical Engineer', department: 'Engineering', location: 'New York, NY', type: 'Full-time', salary: '$80,000 - $120,000', experience: '5+ years', description: 'Lead mechanical engineering projects and mentor junior engineers.', requirements: [ 'Bachelor\'s degree in Mechanical Engineering', '5+ years of experience in industrial design', 'Proficiency in CAD software (SolidWorks, AutoCAD)', 'Experience with manufacturing processes', 'Strong problem-solving and communication skills' ] }, { id: 2, title: 'Quality Control Specialist', department: 'Quality Assurance', location: 'Chicago, IL', type: 'Full-time', salary: '$60,000 - $85,000', experience: '3+ years', description: 'Ensure product quality and compliance with industry standards.', requirements: [ 'Bachelor\'s degree in Engineering or related field', '3+ years of quality control experience', 'Knowledge of ISO 9001 standards', 'Experience with testing equipment', 'Attention to detail and analytical skills' ] }, { id: 3, title: 'Sales Representative', department: 'Sales', location: 'Remote', type: 'Full-time', salary: '$50,000 - $80,000 + Commission', experience: '2+ years', description: 'Build relationships with clients and drive sales growth.', requirements: [ 'Bachelor\'s degree in Business or related field', '2+ years of B2B sales experience', 'Strong communication and negotiation skills', 'Technical aptitude and product knowledge', 'Willingness to travel' ] }, { id: 4, title: 'Production Manager', department: 'Operations', location: 'Houston, TX', type: 'Full-time', salary: '$70,000 - $100,000', experience: '5+ years', description: 'Oversee production processes and manage team performance.', requirements: [ 'Bachelor\'s degree in Operations Management', '5+ years of manufacturing experience', 'Leadership and team management skills', 'Knowledge of lean manufacturing principles', 'Experience with ERP systems' ] } ]; const benefits = [ { icon: Award, title: 'Competitive Benefits', description: 'Health, dental, vision, and retirement plans' }, { icon: Users, title: 'Professional Growth', description: 'Training programs and career development opportunities' }, { icon: Clock, title: 'Work-Life Balance', description: 'Flexible schedules and paid time off' }, { icon: DollarSign, title: 'Performance Bonuses', description: 'Annual bonuses and performance incentives' } ]; return (
{/* Header */}

Join Our Team

Build your career with a company that values innovation, growth, and excellence

{/* Company Overview */}

Why Work With Us?

At TechHardware Pro, we believe in fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning. Our team members are our greatest asset, and we invest in their growth and development.

We offer competitive compensation, comprehensive benefits, and opportunities to work on cutting-edge projects that make a real impact in the industrial world.

{benefits.map((benefit, index) => (

{benefit.title}

{benefit.description}

))}
{/* Job Openings */}

Open Positions

Explore our current job openings and find the perfect opportunity to grow with us

{jobs.map((job, index) => ( setSelectedJob(job)} >

{job.title}

{job.department}

{job.location}
{job.type}
{job.salary}
{job.experience}

{job.description}

))}
{/* Job Modal */} {selectedJob && ( setSelectedJob(null)} > e.stopPropagation()} >

{selectedJob.title}

{selectedJob.department}

{selectedJob.location}
{selectedJob.type}
{selectedJob.salary}
{selectedJob.experience}

Job Description

{selectedJob.description}

Requirements

    {selectedJob.requirements.map((requirement, index) => (
  • {requirement}
    • ))}
)}
); }; export default Career;
